name: Amaranthus
description:
Developed by Nicole Polidore, JustinaY and ysong

In a dying world a god resides weakened and unable to save it. Through exploring a world, who's air is poisoned by its own fauna, you must find the ingredients and discover tools to restore the god and in turn save the earth to the once beautiful state it knew. 

Amaranths is a mobile game that does not contain violent action or an environment, which players could calmly experience the setting of the world as well as riddles in the game. 

How to play:

Simply tap (for mobile) or click (for PC) on the ground to move the main character! ** Press ESC button to quit the game on PC **
